evidence.claim: Roots Automation utilizes AWS services for their cloud infrastructure.
The company adheres to HIPAA standards for data protection in health tech solutions.
Integration patterns with EHR systems are a core part of their platform.
Roots Automation mentions the use of HL7 standards in their health tech applications.
The company's engineering page details use of Azure DevOps for CI/CD.

icp.icp_reason: No direct evidence of X12 transaction capabilities found on their site.
